name: CUBER STRIKE
description:
Welcome to CUBER STRIKE, an undercover first-person shooter. Bring your friends and join the battle, also you can fight bots alone in one of the modes: Free for All, Team Death Match and Capture the Flag .


In this game you start by choosing one of 4 classes, each player class differs in its characteristics from the others. Someone has more armor, someone has more lives and regeneration. Also on the map are hidden various additional types of weapons that will help you win the battle. You can choose a class suitable for you and use its characteristics, but change the game weapon during the game.


Class selection
Choose between 4 classes: Support, Recon, Engineer, and Assault. Each class has Unique Skill Equipment and weapons. Choose a class that suits your style of play and go against the others.


Different levels

When creating a game, do not forget to specify the location that you like. There are different sizes of levels, choose the one that suits you. In each level, various types of weapons are hidden that will help you in battles.

Play Google : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cubik.cuberstrike
IOS : https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/royal-area/id1476179007
